EmailTemplate.name: Bylaws & Resolutions - NP (BAP)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your LegalZoom Inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business needs. In regard to your inquiry, while LegalZoom does not currently directly assist with creating Bylaws & Resolutions for Non-Profit Corporations, we do offer our Business Advantage Pro service which may prove beneficial. This service provides unlimited half-hour consultations on new legal matters with licensed attorneys. The attorney may be able to assist with drafting Bylaws & Resolutions for your Non-Profit for an additional fee.
BUSINESS ADVANTAGE PRO 6-Month - $161.94 ($26.99/month) 12-Month - $287.88 ($23.99/month)
GET STARTED http://www.legalzoom.com/attorneys-lawyers/legal-plans/business.html
If you have any additional questions, please feel free to contact us by phone at the phone number listed below.
Best regards,
{!User.FirstName} (800) 773-0888 x{!User.Extension} www.legalzoom.com
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
